member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Angular.StiAngularDesigner.DesignerDataResult(Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiRequestParams,Stimulsoft.Report.Angular.StiAngularDesignerOptions)
member.summary: Get the action result which returns a set of client scripts necessary for the work of the designer for Angular version.

A set of options that will be used for the designer.
